title: (x) Powwow logo - based on Horatio {Alexey}
content:
Hi people,

Any ideas which font this logo is based on??

Cheers og thanks

Henriko

| --- | --- |
| [powwow.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071126054843/http:/typophile.com/files/powwow.jpg) | 2.61 KB |

 [‹ (x) Bjork cover font - custom by M/M Paris {Dav}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071126054843/http:/www.typophile.com/node/18674 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Felcher Fox & Litner P.C letterhead - Sackers Gothic {Patricia} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071126054843/http:/www.typophile.com/node/18677 "Go to next forum topic")
author: henriko

comments.content: [Possible](http://web.archive.org/web/20071126054843/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=EF.6447.0.3&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=povvvvovv&sampleSize=48), if the used ’v’s instead of ’w’s and shortened the descender of the ’p’.
